attributes.action: have a national advertising campaign on 'HOW TO DRIVE CORRECTLY ON MOTORWAYS' to prevent congestion, accidents and drivers sitting in the middle lane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the amount of traffic on motorways and no education on motorway driving when undertaking the driving test, the government should do a national advertising campaign to educate drivers on the correct way to drive on motorways and not to sit in lanes,etc. Also put warnings on overhead gantrys on motorways.
